This article is about non-event NPC. For 2021 Birthday event NPC, see Father Aereck (2021 Birthday event).
Father Aereck

NPC ID2812

Father Aereck is a Saradominist priest who maintains the over 230-year-old church of Lumbridge called Lumbridge Chapel.

He is the person players must speak with to start The Restless Ghost quest.

He also plays a role in The Lost Tribe quest as one of the citizens of Lumbridge which you should speak to about the strange goings-on beneath Lumbridge Castle.

From his younger days, Father Aereck is friends with another priest named Father Urhney, who currently resides in the Lumbridge Swamp as a hermit. According to Urhney, Aereck always "gets himself into lots of problems", such as the instance when he "kept on getting stuck, up bell rope" when the two were priest initiates.

Father Aereck was one of the Lumbridge citizens to be attacked by a monkey during the 2021 Birthday event.

Contents

  • 1 Treasure Trails
  • 2 Dialogue
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

  • Father Aereck is the solution to the medium anagram clue: AREA CHEF TREK. The answer to his challenge scroll is 19 (20 if players failed to save Jarvis during the 2017 Halloween event).
  • Father Aereck is the solution to the elite cryptic clue: A reck you say; let's pray there aren't any ghosts.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
17 March 2021
(update)

Father Aereck (2021 Birthday event) was replaced with the regular Father Aereck. Father Aereck's NPC ID changed to 2812.

17 February 2021
(update)

Father Aereck was removed from the world and replaced with a nameless NPC in the game's cache. Father Aereck (2021 Birthday event) took his place in the world for the 2021 Birthday event.

22 May 2006
(update)

The NPC now always appears above players standing in the same tile.
